header.title: It cluster academy online.
header.text: Participate in a grant program from the IT Cluster Academy

aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.text: IT Cluster Academy is one of the most successful projects created by the Ivano-Frankivsk IT cluster in 2016. The main purpose of the academy is to provide Ukrainian companies with competent specialists and the development of the IT industry of Ukraine. Currently, IT Cluster is actively involved in employment assistance for ATO / OOS veterans, organizing sports marathons and supporting hospitals during the COVID-19 Pandemic.

courses.sectionTitle_1: Study at the IT Cluster Academy online.
courses.sectionTitle_2: View current courses and register for a free consultation!

grantProgram.programText: The world changed during the pandemic. All training went online. We know how difficult    it is for the education sector to master the online learning format, so Ivano-Frankivsk IT Cluster and IT Cluster Academy have created mini-courses for teachers and educators to share experiences and help automate learning processes as quickly and easily as possible. It's time to discover new technologies!
grantProgram.partisipationText: The grant program is designed for teachers and employees of educational institutions of Ukraine. The training lasts for 3 weeks and is absolutely free. Leave an application and we will confirm your participation within 2 working days.

programPlan.title: Program
items: Topic 1: Acquaintance. We evaluate the education market.
Topic 2: We are talking about effective learning in 2020.
Topic 3: Learning processes. How to transfer learning to an online format and automate it.
Topic 4: Technical side of training. Course evaluation.
Topic 6: Motivation of employees and students. How to work remotely without losing the quality of training.

signUp.title: Sign up for free training from ITCA today!
